Property.name: ShowMoreRings
Property.HelpText: The HUD will show more than 999 rings (up to the maximum amount of rings: 32767)

Property.name: ShowMoreLives
Property.HelpText: The HUD will show more than 999 lives (up to the maximum amount of lives: 127)

Property.name: ShowCurrentLife
Property.HelpText: Show the active life instead of remaining lives like other Sonic games.
